name: Lost AC Boi
description:
LOST AC BOI

AC Boi is lost and was flown out through the back of a transportational vehicle, help him navigate through trough levels and reunite with his AC Mom!

Help the little lost AC boi find his mother through rigorous courses that challenge the player to beat them and collect batteries around the level to make sure to keep AC boi from dying off. The basis of the level and game design took inspiration from a basic rumba that swivels when cleaning the house, and I found it to be quite cute making it similar to the main player. The game should be engaging and aesthetically pleasing to the player when assuming gameplay.
